tddt

Class Babysteps

  • java.lang.Object
    • tddt.Babysteps

  • public class Babysteps
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the Babysteps plugin.
    Version:
    unknown
    Author:
    Caro Jachmann

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long duration 
      private boolean enabled 
      private long startTime 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Babysteps()
      A babysteps object is created with the boolean variable 'enabled' set to false and the long variable 'duration' set to 180 (seconds).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disable()
      Sets enabled to false.
      void enable()
      Sets enabled to true.
      boolean isEnabled() 
      void setDuration(int duration)
      Sets a new Babysteps duration if the new duration differs from the old duration.
      (package private) void startPhase()
      This method sets the start time of the Object to the current time.
      (package private) boolean timeLeft()
      This method subtracts the startTime from the current time.

    • Field Detail

      • startTime

        private long startTime

      • duration

        public long duration

      • enabled

        private boolean enabled

    • Constructor Detail

      • Babysteps

        public Babysteps()
        A babysteps object is created with the boolean variable 'enabled' set to false and the long variable 'duration' set to 180 (seconds).

    • Method Detail

      • startPhase

        void startPhase()
        This method sets the start time of the Object to the current time.

      • timeLeft

        boolean timeLeft()
        This method subtracts the startTime from the current time. The amount of milliseconds that emerges is converted to seconds.
        Returns:
        True if the elapsed time is less than the Babysteps cycle duration, otherwise false.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        True if babysteps is enabled

      • enable

        public void enable()
        Sets enabled to true.

      • disable

        public void disable()
        Sets enabled to false.

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration(int duration)
        Sets a new Babysteps duration if the new duration differs from the old duration.
        Parameters:
        duration - The new babysteps cycle duration.
